tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosage FLOAT,
    duration INT,
    side_effects TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trial_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_id INT,
    result_value FLOAT,
    result_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (treatment_id) REFERENCES treatments(treatment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  trial_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Trials (
  trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  duration INT,
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  trial_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Outcomes (
  outcome_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  outcome_date DATE,
  outcome VARCHAR(100),
  trial_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    condition TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    treatment_name TEXT,
    duration INT,
    cost DECIMAL,
    effectiveness TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trials (
    trial_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE outcomes (
    outcome_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    trial_id SERIAL,
    outcome_value TEXT,
    outcome_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trial_id SERIAL,
    milestone TEXT,
    milestone_date DATE,
    is_completed BOOLEAN
);
